span.span: Provides classes to support user-created annotations on content displayed in WPF document viewing controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的型別命名空間可供支援的使用者建立的附註管理在 Windows Presentation Foundation 文件檢視控制項中顯示的應用程式資料。Types in the namespace are provided to support the management of user-created annotations on application data displayed in Windows Presentation Foundation document viewing controls. 使用[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_caf](~/includes/tlasharptla-caf-md.md)]應用程式可以加入使用者建立的便箋和醒目提示儲存分開的應用程式文件本身的支援。Using the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_caf](~/includes/tlasharptla-caf-md.md)] applications can add support for user-created notes and highlights that are stored separate from the application document itself. 因為使用者註釋資訊分開儲存文件內容，使用者甚至可以新增附註，並反白顯示無法實際變更的唯讀或版權管理文件。Since the user annotation information is stored separately from the document content, users can even add notes and highlights to read-only or rights-managed documents that cannot be physically changed.
